author: Hubert_moerk
title: Architecture studio the set for the creative architects
review:
Being based in Denmark makes it almost impossible to get this set a resonable Price, but after asking my afol network in the USA i found a very helpful friend being able to submit me the so long expected set.

Box/Instructions

The Box is really having a nice design, quite appealing for architects and fan of LEGO. You do not have formal instruction, but more some advises how to build your own creations. Book covers all aspects of being a creative architect as e.g. Space, shapes, etc... It contains quite relevant inputs from architects and inspires one to be creative.

Parts

The parts are interesting, but to this price tag I would have expected more parts and with rare ones too, which seems not being the case. It is a bit a disappointment, not have other shapes to make interesting buildings. 

Minifigures

No minifigures include to this serious set.

The build

It is up to you own creativity. 

The completed model

Not applicable

Overall opinion

Great set for beginning architects and advanced builders.
